data.title: Scott O’Neil & Steve Birch: Can Microsoft, JD.com Lead A Stock Market Comeback?
data.text: Scott O'Neil, CEO of IBD parent company Data Analysis Inc. and Steve Birch, CEO of William O’Neil + Co. joined the podcast this week. In the second part of this two part series, they discussed potential stocks that could emerge as leaders in the next market uptrend: Atlassian Corp. (TEAM), JD.com (JD) and Microsoft (MSFT). For the video version, show notes and charts, visit investors.com/podcast.

data.title: Analyst Says Microsoft Is Relatively Well-Positioned For A Crisis
data.text: For investors scouting around for resilient stocks in the face of the COVID-19 crisis, Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ: MSFT) could be a good bet, according to a Morgan Stanley analyst.

data.title: 4 Cloud Stocks to Win Big in the Wake of Coronavirus
data.text: Because of the shift in consumer and enterprise behavior in response to the pandemic, cloud stocks look more valuable.
